review_details: Its a wow - prawn linguine at its best - so flavoursome!! Wines are are pricey, but well chosen. A real treat!!

Perfect setting, within walking distance of everything but still private enough. House is well equipped, and spacious. Could easily spend the day on the terrace instead of beach! Only info missing from the advertisement is that you need to be quite mobile to walk the 100m from road to villa. I would definitely stay in only that one rental next time - need nothing more!
reviewFor: Terrace over the Agean, villa with 3 bedrooms overlooking Ftelia

review_details: Captain Dimitris knows just what visitors should see and experience - it was amazing! Swimming in crystal clear water off the most beautiful beaches, and even went into deeper sea to give my boys the opportunity to fish a bit. Was a real hit, worth every cent!
